description.value: If a creature that can see moves 10 feet into the affected area, the hazard rolls Stealth (+16) for its initiative.

stealth.details: @Check[type:perception|dc:22|traits:action:seek] to detect the subtle magical aura of the land

details.description: What seems like an innocent stretch of land assaults trespassers with terrible illusions.
details.disable: @Check[type:arcana|dc:22], @Check[type:nature|dc:22], @Check[type:occultism|dc:22], or @Check[type:religion|dc:22] (by a hero with expert proficiency in that skill) three times to temporarily disrupt the magic, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (3rd-level spell, DC 25)
details.reset: The terrible visions cease after all creatures have left the affected area, but the hazard is immediately ready to inflict its visions on the next creature to enter.
details.routine:
(1 action) Terrible visions assail the minds of all creatures who can see within the affected area. Each creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:24] saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[(2d8+9)[mental]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 3}.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[(4d8+18)[mental]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 4}.
